targets.expr:
(sum(rate(production_exchange_proxy_request_proc_time_sum{key="full_time", exchange=~"$exchange"}[15m])) by (exchange)/
  sum(rate(production_exchange_proxy_request_proc_time_count{key="full_time", exchange=~"$exchange"}[15m])) by (exchange)) - (sum(rate(production_exchange_proxy_request_message_time_sum{exchange=~"$exchange"}[15m])) by (exchange)/
  sum(rate(production_exchange_proxy_request_message_time_count{exchange=~"$exchange"}[15m])) by (exchange))

panels.title: Messages received per type by exchange
